home.title: Find Your Next
home.subtitle: Discover open-source projects that match your skills and interests. Get personalized recommendations and find meaningful ways to contribute to the community.
home.step1Description: Tell us about your programming languages, frameworks, and areas of interest.
home.step2Description: Our AI analyzes your profile and suggests relevant open-source projects.
home.step3Description: Browse projects, check their contribution guidelines, and make your first contribution.
home.benefit1Description: Showcase your skills with real-world projects that employers value.
home.benefit2Description: Collaborate with experienced developers and improve your coding skills.
home.benefit3Description: Support the tools and libraries you use by helping improve them.
home.getStartedDescription: Join thousands of developers contributing to open source projects.

skills.title: Tell Us About Your Skills
skills.subtitle: Help us find the perfect open-source projects for you
skills.selectFrameworks: Select frameworks and libraries you know

analysis.title: GitHub Skills Analysis
analysis.loginDescription: Please login with GitHub to analyze your coding skills and get personalized recommendations.
analysis.noAnalysisDescription: Click the analyze button to scan your GitHub profile and discover your skills automatically.

recommendations.title: Recommended Projects
recommendations.subtitle: Based on your skills and interests
recommendations.noResults: No projects found matching your criteria.
recommendations.tryDifferent: Try adjusting your skills or interests.

footer.description: Kontri helps developers find meaningful open-source projects to contribute to.
footer.madeWith: Made with ❤️ by the Kontri team

auth.pleaseWait: Please wait while we authenticate you...

history.title: Search History
history.emptyDescription: Your search history will appear here after you submit skills
history.confirmClear: Are you sure you want to clear all search history?

cookies.title: We use cookies
cookies.description: We use cookies to enhance your experience, remember your preferences, and analyze site usage. By continuing to use our site, you consent to our use of cookies.

essential.title: Essential Cookies
essential.description: These cookies are necessary for the website to function and cannot be disabled. They are usually set in response to actions made by you such as setting your privacy preferences or filling in forms.

functional.title: Functional Cookies
functional.description: These cookies remember your preferences and choices (like search history) to provide a more personalized experience.

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
analytics.description: These cookies help us understand how visitors interact with our website by collecting and reporting information anonymously.
